item.title: Trump says he ‘talked about the concept of firing’ Jerome Powell. Stocks went for a ride
item.description: The S&P 500 rose 0.3% after whipping through an earlier drop and subsequent recovery. The Dow gained 231 points, or 0.5%, and the Nasdaq added 0.3% to...

item.title: Amazon’s humble history: Jeff Bezos used a rented garage as an office and held team meetings at a local Barnes & Noble
item.description: Amazon's trajectory from a rented garage to a $2.4 trillion enterprise is now business legend.

item.title: Markets have a frenzied day after rumors Trump might fire Jerome Powell
item.description: Stocks plummeted when a series of reports indicated president Donald Trump was close to firing the Fed chair. They soared once he denied them.

item.title: JPMorgan’s plan to charge for data could ‘cripple’ crypto and fintech startups, execs warn
item.description: Kraken Co-CEO Sethi calls JPMorgan fees a toll that limits what can be built.

item.title: One of the most critical AI companies in the world just said it ‘cannot confirm’ growth in 2026, wiping out $30 billion
item.description: Shares of ASML, the Dutch semiconductor equipment giant, tumbled 11% after it reported earnings. It's not just any company.
